emailTemplate.name: newuser_accountcreated
emailTemplate.subject: Welcome to $core_v2_configuration.SiteName
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($user = $core_v2_user.Current) #set($falseValue = false) #set($trueValue = true)

Welcome to $core_v2_configuration.SiteName,

Log in as $user.Username to meet other community members and start participating.

To change your user settings visit your user settings page.

To browser available programs visit Programmessection of the community.

To find projects you are interested in you can view the A-Z projects page.

Similar you can browse users via the users A-Z .

Our $core_v2_configuration.SiteName has different country flavours which you can determine via the country links at the top of the page.

Enough pointers for now, happy connecting and exploring!

Neil
